mapper.select: SELECT * FROM comments WHERE articleIndex = #{articleIndex} AND NOT nickname IN (${blockedList}) ORDER BY refIndex ASC, commentIndex ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments(refIndex, articleIndex, nickname, content) VALUES(#{refIndex}, #{articleIndex}, #{nickname}, #{content})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comments WHERE articleIndex=${articleIndex}, commentIndex=${commentIndex}, refIndex=${refIndex}
